7   package gov.ca.dmv.ease.docs.template.impl;
8   
9   import java.util.ArrayList;
10  import java.util.HashMap;
11  import java.util.Set;
12  import java.util.StringTokenizer;
13  
14  /*** 
15   * Description: Provides the abstract implementation of the generic methods for substitution of variables, 
16   * offset logic for positioning words in the in Document Templates
17   * File: AbstractDocumentTemplate.java
18   * Module:  gov.ca.dmv.ease.docs.util
19   * Created: Aug 11, 2009
20   * @author MWJZC8
21   * @version $Revision: 1.1 $
22   * Last Changed: $Date: 2009/11/23 16:25:16 $
23   * Last Changed By: $Author: mwrsk $
24   */
25  public abstract class AbstractDocumentTemplate {
26  	/*** The receipt lines. */
27  	protected static ArrayList <String> receiptLines = new ArrayList <String>();
28  
29  	/***
30  	 * Make copy.
31  	 * 
32  	 * @param lines the lines
33  	 * 
34  	 * @return the array list< string>
35  	 */
36  	public static ArrayList <String> makeCopy(ArrayList <String> lines) {
37  		ArrayList <String> copyLines = new ArrayList <String>();
38  		for (String line : copyLines) {
39  			String copyLine = new String(line);
40  			copyLines.add(copyLine);
41  		}
42  		return copyLines;
43  	}
44  
45  	/***
46  	 * Substitute.
47  	 * 
48  	 * @param map the map
49  	 * @param lines the lines
50  	 * 
51  	 * @return the array list< string>
52  	 */
53  	public static ArrayList <String> substitute(HashMap map,
54  			ArrayList <String> lines) {
55  		ArrayList <String> replacedLines = new ArrayList <String>();
56  		for (String originalLine : lines) {
57  			String replacedLine = originalLine;
58  			boolean tokenFound = false;
59  			StringTokenizer tokenizer = new StringTokenizer(replacedLine,
60  					",/ \t\n:");
61  			while (tokenizer.hasMoreTokens()) {
62  				String token = tokenizer.nextToken();
63  				if (token.startsWith("#")) {
64  					String value = (String) map.get(token);
65  					replacedLine = replacedLine.replaceAll(token, value);
66  					tokenFound = true;
67  				}
68  			}
69  			if (tokenFound) {
70  				replacedLines.add(replacedLine);
71  			}
72  			else {
73  				replacedLines.add(originalLine);
74  			}
75  		}
76  		return replacedLines;
77  	}
78  
79  	/***
80  	 * Substitute variables.
81  	 * 
82  	 * @param map the map
83  	 * 
84  	 * @return the array list< string>
85  	 */
86  	public static ArrayList <String> substituteVariables(HashMap map) {
87  		Set keys = map.keySet();
88  		ArrayList <String> replacedLines = receiptLines;
89  		replacedLines = substitute(map, replacedLines);
90  		return replacedLines;
91  	}
92  }
